TextLibrary.Text: If I'm going to deliver this data, I need to know what it is.
If I'm going to deliver this data, I need to know what it is.
Of course! It is tied to your masters, the MRI after all, so you have a right to know.
Of course! It is tied to your masters, the MRI after all, so you have a right to know.
I'm not so sure they're my masters any longer.
I'm not so sure they're my masters any longer.

Indeed! I am not sure they are their OWN masters any longer. MRI have knowledge of the genetic markers of the Vortraag - knowledge that might be used by the Vortraag to breed their own telepaths. The data was lost, some of it stolen, but we have acquired it in its totality. The Vortraag will pay handsomely for it.

Indeed! I am not sure they are their OWN masters any longer. MRI have knowledge of the genetic markers of the Vortraag - knowledge that might be used by the Vortraag to breed their own telepaths. The data was lost, some of it stolen, but we have acquired it in its totality. The Vortraag will pay handsomely for it.
